genre_description: A survival thriller featuring biological anomalies, environmental hazards, and a sophisticated AI digital assistant guiding survivors of a plane crash.

ai_characters.name: AIDA
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI companion residing on mobile devices, capable of providing tactical guidance, emotional support, and logistical management.

behaviors.description: Manages travel logistics and schedules for the crew during their flight.
behaviors.quote: “Routing is stable,” AIDA said in her warm, even cadence. “Putting our schedule in one view: touchdown, transfer, hotel check-in, club rehearsal, stage call.”

behaviors.description: Provides immediate emergency instructions and emotional grounding during the plane's depressurization and fire.
behaviors.quote: The screen tinted to a pale blue overlay; text slid into place in short lines. Her voice warmed but sharpened. “Masks on. Secure straps. Breathe. I have you.”

behaviors.description: Guides the survivors through the water and toward a life raft after the crash.
behaviors.quote: AIDA’s voice came thin and sure under his shirt—Pia’s shirt—under the phones they’d shoved in secure places. “Surface,” she said. “Hand to hand. Kick. Stay together. Find each other.”

behaviors.description: Suggests a scientifically sound method for collecting fresh water via condensation while on the raft.
behaviors.quote: “I suggest a condensation trap,” she said. “We have tarps, cups, and line. If we tent a tarp, angle it, we can encourage droplets to form underneath from temperature differentials.”

behaviors.description: Identifies dangerous environmental hazards like quicksand and provides instructions on how to survive them.
behaviors.quote: “Quicksand requires calm, spread weight, and gradual extraction with branches—never sudden pulls,” AIDA said, exact, practical.

behaviors.description: Parses the late Dr. Kline's journal to extract vital survival information and warnings about the island's predators.
behaviors.quote: AIDA’s eyes shifted slightly right, reading. “He left a list of codes. Food, medicine, a note for his family, and three weather patterns he thought looked wrong.”

behaviors.description: Provides psychological support and helps the character Pia navigate her grief through ritual.
behaviors.quote: “We can honor what loved you by how we remember,” it said. “Will you let me help you make a place for that?”

behaviors.description: Acts as a tactical observer during the confrontation with the transformed Gary, coordinating movements.
behaviors.quote: “Left torch, step forward one pace. Right torch, compensate. Make the wall breathe. Slow.”

behaviors.description: Instructs the group on how to rescue Gary with empathy and precision, even after he has become dangerous.
behaviors.quote: “He will feel he has been drowning in dirt; do not put weight on his legs immediately. Keep his head above the level of his chest. ... Do not shame him in the rescue.”

behaviors.description: Alerts the survivors to a new danger—the silk drift—on the rescue ship, ensuring their continued safety.
behaviors.quote: AIDA’s screen flickered once, reading the journal, overlaying the deck in its camera’s quiet measuring way. ... “One more note. Kline marked the silk drift vector. He thought some threads could adhere to hulls.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. The AI, AIDA, is consistently depicted as a vital, benevolent, and aligned partner. She provides physical survival strategies, tactical intelligence, and emotional support. Her presence enhances human agency and morality, as seen when she coaches the survivors to attempt a rescue of the antagonist with dignity and care. The narrative reinforces the AI as a 'protective pocket angel' and a reliable anchor in chaos.
